snippet.title: Gunheart 1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gunheart is an online co-op RPG shooter where you and your friends become customizable robotic bounty hunters trying to make a buck at the edge of the galaxy.  Encounter menacing aliens, explore exotic locations, unlock new gear, and rake in cash to boost your rig. Along the way you’ll master a large arsenal of weapons and discover 40+ mods to customize your loadout.

Built for both PC and VR (Oculus/Vive/WindowsMR).

Steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/551700/Gunheart/
Oculus store page: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1269161316471258/

Follow Drifter for more updates and announcements!:
https://discord.gg/drifter
https://twitter.com/drifter_entmt
https://www.twitch.tv/drifter_entmt
https://www.facebook.com/drifterentertainment
